title: SodaStream Source with SodaCaps - Smart. Simple. Soda.
description:
SodaStream SOURCE designed by Yves Béhar. A soda maker that represents simplicity of beauty. Intuitive and easy experience with new Snap-Lock bottle mechanism. Customize your carbonation with the LED indicator. 

SMART - Less, lugging storing and disposing of bottles and cans. 1 bottle of SodaStream can replace 2,000 bottles and cans.

SIMPLE - Turns water into soda in seconds.

SODA -  Over 60 delicious better for you flavors to choose from.

transcripts: what makes a product simply genius the unique design it's convenience and simplicity of use or the fact that using it actually helps the environment sometimes it's all of these together and more introducing the SodaStream source the home soda maker that turns water into soda in seconds with its easy snap-lock bottle mechanism simple carbonation and three-level carbonation indicators you can create great tasting soda choosing from over 60 delicious better flavors just the way you like it the SodaStream source smart simple soda [Music]
